projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support.
 - Deployed on Netlify.

projects.title: KillerGF Run Game
projects.bodyText:
- KillerGF NFT Website made in React
 -  KillerGF Running Game
 - Hyper Casual Game made in Unity, C# and Node server
 - Deployed on AWS

projects.title: Pet Crush
projects.bodyText:
- Pet Crush 3 Match Game
 - 3 Match Game made in Unity, C#

projects.title: Frontier-Freelancing app
projects.bodyText:
- A Crypto Freelancing Platform & Social App made using **Next.js**, **Solidity** and **Node.js** for developers.
 - Added User authentication and password reset using **JWT** and **Wallet verification**.
 - People can hire developers and easily pay with several payments and crypto.

projects.title: Axxces - Crypto Learning App
projects.bodyText:
- Crypto Learning Platform made using using **Wordpress**
 - Added User authentication and password reset.
 - People can learn everything you need to know about trading Forex, Cryptocurrency, Metaverse, NFT's blockchain and more.

projects.title: Lotusvancouver -  Car Website
projects.bodyText:
- Lotusvancouver is Car Website people can buy and rent cars.
 - Large car site integrated many small car companies in Canada.
 - Charge in frontend and backend development with IT company team.

projects.title: MooningMonkey -  NFT minting App
projects.bodyText:
- MooningMonkey made using **ERC-721A** for **MooningMonkey** buyers.
 - Charge in Art generation.
 - Charge in Smart Contract development.

projects.title: Crime Casino -  Betting App
projects.bodyText:
- Crime Casino made using **Solana** for **Crime** NFT buyers. NFT holders get rewarded from this game.
 - Charge in frontend development and randoom function implement.
 - Charge in smart contract in development using Rust

projects.title: Quidverse -  NFT minting App
projects.bodyText:
- Quidverse made using **ERC-721** for **Quidverse** NFT buyers. NFT holders get rewarded from staking.
 - Charge in frontend and web3 integration.
 - Charge in smart contract development

projects.title: Seven22 - NFT minting App
projects.bodyText:
- Seven22 made using **ERC-721A** for **Seven22** NFT buyers. NFT holders get rewarded from staking.
 - Charge in frontend and web3 integration.
